creator: ealikadic@yahoo.com
text:
Tomcat's manual mentions adding AJP13 handler into server.xml and even offers 
the snippet that needs to be entered. Could we have this snippet in the 
server.xml by default, even if commented out so that it can be easily 
uncommenetd by those who wish to use it?
Right now I have the snippet in a separate file which I then include in 
server.xml and having done that a couple of times, it gets kinda boring :)

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Ajp13 handler is part of server.xml ( at least in 3.3m2 + )
